A

addConsumer(String, String, BiConsumer<Boolean, Object>) - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.SimpleServer
Adds a BiConsumer for the input signal sigName of the clock-domain cdName.

C

close() - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.InputSignal
Tries to shutdown this signal server gracefully.
close() - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.OutputSignal
Cancels any scheduled threads and closes the socket opened by this instance.
com.systemj.netapi - package com.systemj.netapi
Provides classes to exchange signals with the SystemJ clock-domains, see SimpleClient, SimpleServer, TCPSender, and TCPReceiver.
com.systemj.util - package com.systemj.util
Contains internally used utility classes.

E

emit(Object, int) - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.OutputSignal
Emits the signal with a value val for ms millisecond(s).

I

InputSignal - Class in com.systemj.netapi
A class that implements a signal server to accept any incoming requests from com.systemj.ipc.GenericSignalSender.

isServerAlive() - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.InputSignal
Tests if this signal server is still alive.

O

OutputSignal - Class in com.systemj.netapi
A class that implements a signal client, which connects to the server created by com.systemj.ipc.GenericSignalReceiver.

SimpleClient - Class in com.systemj.netapi
This class is used to transmit data to the input signal that implements com.systemj.ipc.SimpleServer

SimpleServer - Class in com.systemj.netapi

sustain() - Method in class com.systemj.netapi.OutputSignal
Sustains the signal indefinitely.
